nls.description: This is a sample Risk assignment process
nls.name: Assign Risks

Condition.ExpressionText: !(( risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_flexibility") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_funding") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_human_interface") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_implementation") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_interdependency") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_objectives") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_org_culture") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_resource_avail") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_sponsorship") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_supportability") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_technical") ))

(( risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_flexibility") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_funding") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_human_interface") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_implementation") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_interdependency") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_objectives") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_org_culture") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_resource_avail") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_sponsorship") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_supportability") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_technical") ))

actionitem.EnterCategoryType.ActionItem-EnterCategoryType.assignees-DONE >= 1 && ( ( risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_flexibility") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_funding") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_human_interface") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_implementation") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_interdependency") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_objectives") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_org_culture") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_resource_avail") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_sponsorship") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_supportability") || risk.thisRisk.category_type == lookup("RIM_CATEGORY_TYPE", "rcf_technical") ))
